message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $95. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'd like to save as much as I can.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $90? This price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $87? I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer.
